<small>Hebrew form: [[H8354]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁתָה‎</span>] **verb** ==drink== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁתָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִשְׁתִּי‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; see Biblical Hebrew I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתָה‎</span>); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִשְׁתִּיו‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 11, 4</sup>, ***a***))[[Dan.5.3|Dan 5:3]]; [[Dan.5.4|Dan 5:4]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יִשְׁתּוֺן‎</span> v[[Dan.5.2|Dan 5:2]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁתֵה‎</span> v[[Dan.5.1|Dan 5:1]], plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁתַ֫יִן‎</span>; — ***drink***, accusative wine [[Dan.5.1|Dan 5:1]]; [[Dan.5.4|Dan 5:4]], + <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> of vessel v[[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]] and (accusative omitted) v[[Dan.5.2|Dan 5:2]] v[[Dan.5.3|Dan 5:3]].
